attributes.source: Reward for inviting the Wanderer to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Hanega: Song of the Wind
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#80FFD7FF">Anemo DMG. This character gains <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Windfavored.

skills.name: Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays
skills.desc: Deals 7 <span style="color:#80FFD7FF">Anemo DMG. If the character has <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Windfavored attached, then remove it and increase DMG by 1.
